FuncDef: This command adds an OS application as an event filter match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: The operator specifying the type of match.
The application name string. Values-port, ppp, rip, route, policy, rsvp, security, snmp, stp, svcmgr, system, user, vrrp, vrtr.

ExtraInfo: Default: no application - no application match criterion is specified
